text: I'm looking for a pythonic way to insert a space before capital letters
I've got a file whose format I'm altering via a python script.
I have several camel cased strings in this file where I just want to insert a single space before the capital letter - so "WordWordWord" becomes "Word Word Word".
My limited regex experience just stalled out on me - can someone think of a decent regex to do this, or (better yet) is there a more pythonic way to do this that I'm missing?
